mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, email, password_hash AS password, name, phone, birth, gender, marketing_agree AS marketingAgree, membership_grade AS membershipGrade, deleted_at AS deletedAt FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, birth = #{birth}, password_hash = #{password}, marketing_agree = #{marketingAgree}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
